overview:
Home Technology made Simple

We are the leading home automation and custom home theater company serving the Metro Atlanta area since 1997. We are licensed and insured and provide the following services: home theater design & installation, home automation, multi-room audio & video, lighting control & motorized shades, security camera & surveillance, hi-fi 2 channel audio, communication & networking, home theater seating & accessories, and commercial AV solutions.

Our motto is “Home Technology made Simple”. Control everything including audio, video, security, lighting, HVAC, irrigation at home or anywhere in the world using iPad, iPhone, computers or in home keypads. The options are endless. Come and visit us at our show house and let us show you how simple home technology can be.
